name: Corrupted within
description:
Corrupted within is a tower defense game, where your job is to make sure that the enemies don't overwhelm you,  use abilities, towers and their skills to your advantage while making sure that you have enough money. The only way to rise to the top is to get rid of the competition, whether that be outworking or simply killing them. Enemies have seen what you are capable of achieving in just a few millenniums, and with their jealousy and greed, they wanted what you have. But you aren't just going to give it to them.

Note - The game is a demo and unfinished.
